core_identity.name: Emberhold Village
core_identity.description: A highland village nestled in a mountain valley, known for its master blacksmiths and the Ancient Forge
core_identity.purpose: Crafting settlement centered around the Ancient Forge and the Ember Crystal
core_identity.history: Founded by master smiths who discovered the Ember Crystal's unique properties

factions.name: Village Council
factions.description: The governing body of Emberhold led by Elder Varric

factions.name: Merchants Guild
factions.description: Traders who bring goods to and from Emberhold

districts.name: Village Square
districts.description: The central area of Emberhold, featuring the Empty Hearth where the Ember Crystal normally resides

notable_features.name: The Empty Hearth
notable_features.description: A large circular stone platform in the center of the village square, designed to hold the Ember Crystal. The platform now sits empty, with only a few embers still glowing faintly.

notable_features.name: Elder's Hut
notable_features.description: A modest stone building with intricate carvings, home to Elder Varric who leads the village council.

districts.name: Market District
districts.description: The commercial hub of Emberhold where goods are traded

notable_features.name: Thorin's Supplies
notable_features.description: A well-stocked trading post run by Merchant Thorin, offering goods from surrounding regions as well as local crafts.
